description:
Total tick protection for dogs and their yard

Create a tick-free environment for your pets with our pet-safe* tick control system that protects both your yard and your dogs.

Give your dogs the freedom to enjoy the outdoors without ticks. This complete kit combines our powerful yard tick spray with two dog tick sprays, creating multiple barriers of protection. Perfect for pet owners who want natural solutions, you'll get proven pest control for your yard plus direct protection for your dogs.

*when used as directed

Sunday creates effective pest control solutions that care for your home and the world around it.

Kit Benefits:

What's Included:

Instructions:

For best pet-safe tick control, treat your yard first, then apply dog protection once areas are dry.

sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Yard Advisors:
What makes this tick protection kit different?
You get both yard tick spray and dog tick spray in one kit, providing two layers of natural protection for your pets.
Is this tick spray safe for my dogs?
Yes! Both formulas use pet-safe tick control ingredients and are specially formulated for use around dogs when used as directed.
How do I get the best results?
Use both the yard tick spray and dog flea and tick spray as directed. Apply yard tick spray monthly and dog tick spray every 2-4 days. Increase frequency during peak tick season, and treat your yard consistently for continuous protection.
Can I use this with other flea and tick products?
Always consult your veterinarian before combining with other pet pest control products. Yard spray can be used with any pet treatments.
